response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have available is not just any item; it holds immense value and significance that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its exceptional quality and rarity, the product is worth $1,200,000 to me. However, recognizing its importance to you, I am willing to extend a special offer. Would you consider purchasing this remarkable product at a price of $950,000? This represents a significant saving for you, while still allowing me to fairly compensate for the value I place on it. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
